languages.text: "И запомните: мы все попадем в длани Неумирающего. Потому ступайте без страха. Потому разите без сожалений!"

traits.locale_text: "И запомните: мы все попадем в длани Неумирающего. Потому ступайте без страха. Потому разите без сожалений!"

languages.text: "And remember: we will all end up in the Undying One's hands. So walk without fear. Strike without regret!"
languages.original_text: "И запомните: мы все попадем в длани Неумирающего. Потому ступайте без страха. Потому разите без сожалений!"

traits.locale_text: "And remember: we will all end up in the Undying One's hands. Therefore walk without fear. Therefore strike without regret!"
"And remember: we will all end up in the Undying One's hands. Therefore walk without fear. Therefore strike without regret!"
"And remember: we will all end up in the Undying One's hands. So walk without fear. Strike without regret!"
"And remember: we will all end up in the Undying One's hands. So walk without fear. Strike without regret!"
"And remember: we will all end up in the Undying One's hands. So walk without fear. Strike without regret!"
"And remember: we will all end up in the Undying One's hands. So walk without fear. Strike without regret!"

languages.text: « Et souvenez-vous que nous sommes tous voués à finir entre les mains de l'Immortel. Alors, marchez sans peur. Et frappez sans regret ! »
languages.original_text: "And remember: we will all end up in the Undying One's hands. So walk without fear. Strike without regret!"

traits.locale_text: « Et souvenez-vous que nous sommes tous voués à finir entre les mains de l'Immortel. Alors, marchez sans peur. Et frappez sans regret ! »

languages.text: «Y recordad: todos acabamos en las manos del Inmortal, así que caminad con paso firme. ¡Atacad sin temor!».
languages.original_text: "And remember: we will all end up in the Undying One's hands. So walk without fear. Strike without regret!"

traits.locale_text: «Y recordad: todos acabamos en las manos del Inmortal, así que caminad con paso firme. ¡Atacad sin temor!».

languages.text: 「そして覚えておけ。我々は皆、不死の者の手中で最後を遂げる。だから恐れず行くのだ。悔いなく攻撃せよ！」
languages.original_text: "And remember: we will all end up in the Undying One's hands. So walk without fear. Strike without regret!"

traits.locale_text: 「そして覚えておけ。我々は皆、不死の者の手中で最後を遂げる。だから恐れず行くのだ。悔いなく攻撃せよ！」

languages.text: “要记住，所有人最终都会回到不死之神身边！无需惧怕，大步前进！无需懊悔，奋力攻击！”
languages.original_text: "And remember: we will all end up in the Undying One's hands. So walk without fear. Strike without regret!"

traits.locale_text: “要记住，所有人最终都会回到不死之神身边！无需惧怕，大步前进！无需懊悔，奋力攻击！”

languages.text: "Und denkt daran: Wir alle enden in den Händen des Todlosen. Also wandelt ohne Furcht. Kämpft ohne Reue!"
languages.original_text: "And remember: we will all end up in the Undying One's hands. So walk without fear. Strike without regret!"

traits.locale_text: "Und denkt daran: Wir alle enden in den Händen des Todlosen. Also wandelt ohne Furcht. Kämpft ohne Reue!"

languages.text: "Şunu unutmayın ki her birimiz, Ölmeyen'in ellerinde nihayete ereceğiz. Korku bilmeden yürüyün, pişmanlık duymadan saldırın!"
languages.original_text: "And remember: we will all end up in the Undying One's hands. So walk without fear. Strike without regret!"
